effect.short: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.
effect.full: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

flavorTexts.text:
The user chants an incantation toward the sky,
preventing opposing Pokémon from landing
critical hits for five turns.
